title.native: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は 何をする?
title.romaji: Saikyou no Ousama, Nidome no Jinsei wa Nani wo Suru?

description:
After a mysterious death, King Grey is reborn as Arthur Leywin on the magical continent of Dicathen. Although he enters his second life as a baby, his previous wisdom remains. He begins to master magic and forge his own path as the years go by, seeking to correct the mistakes of his past life.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Cultivation
tags.description: Features characters using training, often martial arts-related, and other special methods to cultivate qi (a component of traditional Chinese philosophy, described as "life force") and gain strength or immortality.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

[Twitter](https://x.com/kala) | [Instagram 1](https://www.instagram.com/c9.kala/) | [Instagram 2](https://www.instagram.com/kalattv/) |  [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@prodbykala?) | [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/kala) 

Canadian, vocalist, producer, musician, and creator based in Los Angeles and Japan.  Active in esports since 2016, KALA joined Cloud9 in 2019 as a Team Manager, later transitioning into music to create original compositions for the brand. KALA is the first Canadian artist signed to SACRA MUSIC, a Sony Music Japan sub-label specializing in anime, gaming, and digital entertainment.
